DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : ADVERTISING
DOC.TEXT: McDonald ' s Replaces Latino Agency : McDonald ' s Corp . said it named del Rivero , Messianu Advertising , a unit of Omnicom Group Inc. ' s DDB Needham Worldwide , as its Latino advertising_agency . McDonald ' s dropped its previous Latino agency , Castor Advertising in New York . Del Rivero , based in Coral Gables , Fla. , has annual billings estimated at about $ 25 million and will handle all_of the fast-food giant ' s national Latino marketing and creative work .
